task_description: Conform the site design to the Teaouse Design System - a calm, premium, illustrated tea brand experience emphasizing ritual over speed, warmth over sharpness, and story over noise.

patterns.tailwind_extension: Colors defined in theme.extend.colors with semantic naming (e.g., grey-0 through grey-90). Add design tokens in same pattern.
patterns.css_layers: @layer components {} used in globals.css for reusable utility classes. Add design system classes here.
patterns.clx_conditional: Use clx() from @medusajs/ui for conditional class composition: clx('base-classes', className, { conditional: true })
patterns.component_styling: Components use Tailwind classes directly. Medusa UI preset classes like bg-ui-bg-subtle, text-ui-fg-base used throughout.
patterns.text_utilities: Text sizing uses txt-compact-medium, txt-small-plus patterns from Medusa UI
patterns.transitions: Use transition-colors duration-200 ease-in for hover states. Current animations use cubic-bezier - review for calm feel.

existing_implementations.description: Existing Medusa starter template uses grey color scale, Inter font, and Medusa UI preset. Current styling includes bg-white, border-ui-border-base, shadow-elevation-card-rest.
